input_args.passage: 'Tales from the Crypt - Full Cast & Crew | Stars who appeared included Terri Hatcher, Demi Moore, Martin Sheen, Treat Williams, Margo Kidder and Joe Pesci. The series premiered on HBO, and edited reruns ...'
